txt.en: Éomer is at the southern end of the Stonewain Valley, and he prepares to ride out of the vale and toward the Pelennor's encircling wall.
Théoden's Riders have taken the field!
The Rohirrim have passed through the Stonewain Valley, and now they prepare for battle.

'Ready your steed, my friend! The time has come for riding with haste!'

<rgb=#00FF00>Mount your travelling steed and speak to Éomer to join the Rohirrim for the final leg of their journey.</rgb>
'Let us ride to the encircling wall!'
Talk to Éomer from horseback and join Théoden's Riders

'Let us ride to the encircling wall together, [placeholder]!'

<rgb=#FF0000>This is a Solo quest and cannot be completed with a Fellowship.</rgb>
'This is a day for honour and glory!'
Book 5, Chapter 8: The Ride of the Rohirrim
Talk to Théoden on the Field of Onslaught
'This day will live long in the hearts of my people! This is a day for deeds of honour and glory, [placeholder]!'
